content:

inventory=[{"type": "dragon_breath", "quantity": 55, "index": 11}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 16, "index": 12}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 62, "index": 13}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 40, "index": 14}, {"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 37, "index": 17}, {"type": "blue_banner", "quantity": 12, "index": 18}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 4, "index": 20}, {"type": "dark_oak_leaves", "quantity": 45, "index": 24}, {"type": "music_disc_13", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 8, "index": 29}, {"type": "enderman_spawn_egg", "quantity": 20, "index": 30}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "red_stained_glass", "quantity": 17, "index": 34}, {"type": "light_gray_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 38}, {"type": "oak_stairs", "quantity": 60, "index": 41}, {"type": "ender_chest", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}]
thought: I need to craft prismarine from 4 prismarine shards. There are 4 shards in slot 20. Therefore I will start by moving one of them to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1
